description: Talk with cast members Takumi Yasuaki (Mizugaki Tsukasa`s VA), Amamiya Sora (Isla`s VA), Akasaki Chinatsu (Kinushima Michiru`s VA) and Yahagi Sayuri (Zack`s VA). Includes making latte art with artist Matsuno Kouhei followed by cast drinking and enjoying themselves in the second half.

titles.title: Limited Edition Special Video: Cast Tea Party
限定版特典映像キャストお茶会
